VoiceDir5.101BAB: Regular volume for the first half, in a mock-joking/proud tone. Then a bit quieter and more somber, in the second half. He's trying to cover up his pain and isn't totally succeeding.
Line5.101BAB: Wait 'til you've burned as many as I have... just about every last soul you've known...
Line1.101BAB: Not the (hic) most pleasant work, eh?
